{"id":986214619,"lang":"cpp","lang_name":"C++","time":"2 months, 1 week","timestamp":1688484005,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"509 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/986214619/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Valid Palindrome","memory":"7.6 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n\n    string remove_non_alpha(string t) {\n        int i = 0;\n        int n = t.size();\n\n        while (i < n) {\n            if (!isalnum(t[i]) || t[i] == ' ') {\n                t.erase(i, 1);\n                n--;\n            }\n            else {\n                i++;\n            }\n        }\n\n        return t;\n    }\n\n    string to_lower(string t) {\n        for (auto &c : t) {\n            c = tolower(c);\n        }\n\n        return t;\n    }\n\n    bool isPalindrome(string s) {\n        s = remove_non_alpha(s);\n        s = to_lower(s);\n        \n        for (int i = 0, j = s.size()-1; i < j; i++, j--) {\n            if (s[i] != s[j]) return false;\n         }\n\n        return true;\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"valid-palindrome","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
